short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track applications across the web with this plugin from Thrive Career Wellness. For use in the EU region.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy to use extension that allows you to save job postings from various job boards across the world!
